quickJump.text: Ready to book? Jump to consultation

intro.text: Our services include, but not limited to, the following:

services.name: Consultation
services.description: Initial consultation to understand your needs.

services.name: Psychiatric Diagnostic Evaluation
services.description: Comprehensive evaluation of mental health needs.

services.name: Treatment Plan Development
services.description: Personalized plan aligned with your goals.

services.name: Individual Psychotherapy
services.description: One-on-one therapy tailored to your needs.

services.name: Family Psychotherapy, without patient
services.description: Support for family members without the patient present.

services.name: Family Psychotherapy, conjoint psychotherapy, with patient present
services.description: Family sessions with the patient present.

services.name: Group Psychotherapy, other than multiple-family group
services.description: Therapeutic groups for shared support and growth.

services.name: Couples Therapy
services.description: Support to strengthen communication and connection.

services.name: EAP Session
services.description: Workplace mental health support through EAP.

services.name: Peer support services
services.description: Support from people with lived experience.

conditionsSection.title: Conditions We Support
conditionsSection.subtitle: We provide specialized support for various conditions. Click to learn more about our approach.

conditions.name: Anxiety Therapy
conditions.description: Support for managing anxiety, panic, and worry through evidence-based approaches.

conditions.name: ADHD Support
conditions.description: Comprehensive support for attention, focus, and executive function challenges.

conditions.name: Depression Treatment
conditions.description: Evidence-based therapy to help you navigate depression and find hope again.

conditions.name: Bipolar Disorder Support
conditions.description: Specialized support for managing mood cycles and building stability.

conditions.name: Trauma/PTSD Therapy
conditions.description: Trauma-informed care to help you heal from past experiences and build resilience.

conditions.name: Stress Management
conditions.description: Tools and strategies to manage stress, build coping skills, and improve well-being.

conditions.name: Identity/Transition Support
conditions.description: Affirming support for gender identity, transition, and authentic self-expression.

ctaSection.title: Ready to get started?
ctaSection.subtitle: We're here to support you on your healing journey.

secondaryCTA.title: I need to make a referral
